comment: The main text block containing the title, author, and content of the page. It includes the heading '說文解字弟七 上' (Shuowen Jiezi Dì Qī Shàng), the author's name '漢太尉祭酒許慎記' (Hàn Tàiwèi Jìjiǔ Xǔ Shèn Jì), and the beginning of the character entry for '日'. The text is arranged vertically in traditional Chinese format, with columns from right to left. A red seal stamp reading '東方文化學院京都研究所' (Dōngfāng Wénhuà Xuéyuàn Kyōto Yánjiūsuǒ) is visible on the right side of the text block.
